p: The leaves and stems had high contents of total carotenoidsâ€™ (708.3 mg/kg dw in leaves; 519.4 mg/kg dw in stems) ( Table 6a). Ten known carotenoids were detected, including carotene (49.95% in leaves; 51.94% in stems), lutein (19.28% in leaves; 20.40% in stems), neoxanthin (11.98% in leaves; 12.25% in stems), viola-xanthin (5.96% in leaves; 5.93% in stems), xanthophyll (7.02% in leaves; 4.81% in stems), anthera-xanthin (4.39% in leaves; 3.68% in stems), asta-xanthin (1.39% in leaves; 0.97% in stems). The remainder (<0.1%) consisted of beta-cryptoxanthin, malvidin and lycopene.
